button_role=\"presentation\": The issue in the code snippet is that the button element has an inappropriate role attribute with the value "presentation". Since it's a button, it should have a role attribute with the value "button". However, the button element does not need an explicit role attribute, as its default role is already "button". form_role=\"form\":
